## ThirdwebSDK.getMarketplaceModule() method

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getMarketplaceModule(address: string): MarketplaceModule;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  address | string | The contract address of the given BundleDrop module. |

<b>Returns:</b>

[MarketplaceModule](./sdk.marketplacemodule.md)

The Drop Module.
